divs: Sighting Detailsi came home late one night and was locked out so i layed down on the porch itwas around 3 or 4 oclock at night. i was lying on my back and saw a light gostraight across the sky it was really high in the air. when i saw it i wasthinking i cant believe what im seeing. could it be. no it cant be. well maybeit is. i jumped to my feet and i was just stairing at it. after it was gone istarted thinking to myself and i started thinking that i was possible that iseen a ufo but then i started thinking of all of the other things it could havebeen. i thought it might be a jet or maybe a satelite rotating the earth. theobject just few in a straight line the light would dimm it would never gocompletely out but it would really dimm. it few out of sight it didnt reallydisappear i dont think. i just flew out of sight. it was to far away. it wasmoving really fast.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Golconda
There were no other sightings in Golconda on or around November 30th 1997
